content:
If you’re using a minimal image, you might need to add ca-certificates:
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 FROM alpine AS certs RUN apk add --no-cache ca-certificates FROM scratch COPY --from=certs /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt /etc/ssl/certs/ COPY my-go-binary / CMD ["/my-go-binary"]
title: Certificates in Docker Containers

content:
Joining a directory with a leading slash doesn’t necessarily do what you’d think.
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 import os os.path.join("/tmp/", "other") # '/tmp/other' os.path.join("/tmp/", "other") # '/tmp/other' os.path.join("/tmp/", "/other") # '/other' (?!) 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 import pathlib tmp = pathlib.Path("/tmp") other = pathlib.Path("other") tmp / other # PosixPath('/tmp/other') other = pathlib.Path("/other") tmp / other # PosixPath('/other')
title: Joining Python Paths
